** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|list|attribute}}: (Optional) {{json ref|attribute|tag=1}}
** {{nbt|list|id}}: (Optional) Checks the namespaced ID of the attribute modifier.
** {{nbt|double|amount}}: (Optional) Checks the amount from the attribute modifier. Matches an exact {{nbt|int}}value, or checks if the value is between a range.
** {{nbt|compound|amount}}: (Optional) Another format.
*** {{nbt|double|max}}: (Optional) The maximum value.
*** {{nbt|double|min}}: (Optional) The minimum value.
** {{nbt|string|operation}}: (Optional) Checks the operation of the attribute modifier. Must be one of {{cd|add_value|add_multiplied_base|add_multiplied_total|d=and}}.
** {{nbt|string|slot}}: (Optional) Checks the slot of the attribute modifier. Must be one of {{cd|any|mainhand|offhand|hand|head|chest|legs|feet|armor|body|d=and}}.
